Desc.entry: Provides counselling to individuals aged 17 years and over on a range of issues including anxiety, low mood, relationship issues, low self-esteem and bereavement. Experienced counsellors working within the BACP ethical framework, receiving regular supervision and covered by professional liability insurance. Costs approximately Â£35 per 50 minute session. May be able to offer lower rates to people on low incomes. Open to partnership working with local charities.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Daytime and early evening appointments available. Please contact in advance to arrange
